snippet: In celebration of Hanukkah, this week's Poetry Pairing matches "Honorary Jew" by John Repp with "How to Be a Jew at Christmas," a blog post about raising Jewish children in the United States, where many people tend to assume everyone celebrates...
abstract: In celebration of Hanukkah, this week's Poetry Pairing matches "Honorary Jew" by John Repp with "How to Be a Jew at Christmas," a blog post about raising Jewish children in the United States, where many people tend to assume everyone celebrates Christmas.
